content.p: Consider the following weighted network with labeled weights:
Apply Dijkstra's Shortest Path Algorithm to this network and find the shortest path from v_s to v_d.

outtro.p: After applying the algorithm, we have:

image.description: Weighted network with labeled weights, and distances from the source.

outtro.p: The distance from v_d to v_d is {{Dd}}. An example of such a path is v_s{{#ShortPath}}, v_{ {{i}} } {{/ShortPath}} .
